title: Hey Malicious maybe you can answer this for me
body: Why does Morde's dragon randomly pick new targets to attack? I just got done with my first Morde game and each time I got dragon it would hit a tower or champion once or twice and then it would just pick something new to hit. I could not figure out any rhyme or reason to the target it picked either.

replies.body:
Because the dragon AI^'s really buggy.
You have to manage it perfectly and reposition it mid fight if you want to use it to maximum efficiency.
If only you could just click once...

From my own experience it seems to be a bug related to how the non ghost dragon targets enemy units.  From the look of things it retains this targeting set AND gains Mordekaiser's orders causing target priority to act goofy.
